name: CLKComplicationRingStyle
desc: Constants indicating the appearance of a progress ring.

items.name: case closed
items.desc: A ring in which the values increase clockwise, starting at 12 oâ€™clock, to create a closed circle.

items.name: case open
items.desc: A ring in which the values increase clockwise, starting in the lower-left corner, leaving an opening at the bottom of the circle.
